Text: We need to ensure VA doctors and employees who endanger veterans are removed, held accountable, and not allowed to be put in positions where they can hurt more veterans and patients. I was sexually assaulted nearly 40 years ago working in Congress - change is long overdue. #MeToo We need to address sexual harassment in all workplaces, on college campuses, in our military, & communities across the country and the halls of Congress can be no exception. #NoMorepic.twitter.com/45u6ridClC

A very special thank you to the men and women who are away from family serving overseas this Thanksgiving. We are all incredibly thankful for our veterans and those who protect our nation.
From my family to yours, have a healthy and Happy Thanksgiving, and safe travels to those who are going elsewhere to celebrate. Enjoy this special time with friends and loved ones!
